alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 6:52PM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Rooks, Osborne and Mitchell Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to the combination of freezing rain and snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light freezing drizzle and light snow will be possible through the evening hours. As precipitation decreases, northwest wind gusts will increase to around 35 MPH.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
